description: Meet the Lowdown Flip, Chaco’s lightweight, low-profile flip built for a water and travel-ready life on the go. Featuring just the essentials in an easy slip-on design, the Lowdown Flip™ looks great dressed up or down and is engineered with high-rebound EVA and their contoured Luvseat™ arch-support for healthy alignment and all-day comfort.
name: Chaco Lowdown Flip - Mens
